Package es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command

Class Summary
CloseCommand  
Command Represents an abstract command from the player (following the Command pattern).
DropCommand Represents a Drop command from the player that moves an item from the player inventory to the player location.
ExamineCommand Represents an Examine command from the player that that shows a list of the items in the player inventory or shows the description of an specific item, depending on the use mode.
GoCommand Represents a Go command from the player that moves the player in a given direction.
HelpCommand Represents a Help command from the player that shows the help information of the game.
LookCommand Represents a Look command from the player that shows the description of the player location.
OpenCommand  
QuitCommand Represents a Help command from the player that ends the game.
TakeCommand Represents a Take command from the player that moves an item from the player location to the player inventory.
UndoCommand Represents a Take command from the player that undoes the last executed command.
